metadata.name: PASSION FRUIT
metadata.description:
Of all things sacred, connecting and owning my sexuality has become one of the most important things in my life. Once a topic that reflected a variety of feelings within me from blushing with shyness and even shame, I always felt a deep curiosity for awakening a passion within me that would shatter my expectations and fill me with delight, give me pleasure, and renew within me a connection with the body that I inhabit and call home in this lifetime. 
Our bodies are miracles. They are a mode of transportation, a vessel of feeling, communication, interaction, sport, and transmutation through the power of love. Whether it be self love, or sharing yourself with another, this piece was made with the intention that the viewer never forget that feeling pleasure in this life is important, self discovery is important, and allowing ourselves to have the things we most want, especially the gift of an orgasm is in every way a form of Self Love.
